definition: exterior surface/family relationship via females/to show (one's opinion)/a model/a table (listing information)/a form/a meter (measuring sth)

sentences.english: Product was identified by analysis of m. p and IR.

sentences.english: A bar line is a vertical line through the staff or system to mark a metrical division, corresponding to the time signature.
